job_history.work_description: Key point of contact and FP&A responsibility for seven diverse and rapidly growing lines of business within Corporate Banking. Full balance sheet and P&L forecasting responsibilities on both balanced balance sheet and MMCOF levels. Business-level and roll-up analysis around customer-level and industry drivers, roll-on/roll-off analysis, an extensive cross-sell portfolio, and loan/deposit pricing.

Responsible for full balance sheet & income statement analysis/forecasting/management reporting for Private Banking line of business consisting of a $43 billion deposit and $34 billion loan portfolio.
Supervised nine staff with constantly changing project goals and deadlines. Responsible for quarterly financial statement and variance analysis for $13 billion commercial real estate portfolio.
Supported Certified Financial Planner & clients to establish individualized financial plans for retirement, investment, insurance, long-term care, and small business needs.
Researched potential lease sites and comparables for corporate clients. Assisted in broker presentations and maintained client relations.

skills.name: Financial Planning
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in financial planning and analysis across multiple roles, including responsibility for full balance sheet and P&L forecasting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Has consistently demonstrated strong analytical skills in financial statement analysis, variance analysis, and forecasting, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Forecasting
skills.explanation: Has experience with balance sheet and P&L forecasting, as well as roll-up analysis and cross-sell portfolio analysis, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has supervised staff and managed project goals and deadlines, showing strong leadership skills.

skills.name: Financial Modeling
skills.explanation: Has likely used financial modeling techniques in forecasting and analysis, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Business Development
skills.explanation: Has experience with business-level analysis and roll-on/roll-off analysis, indicating a solid working proficiency in business development.

skills.name: Client Relationship Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with client relations and presentations, showing a solid working proficiency in client relationship management.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Likely used extensively for financial modeling, forecasting, and analysis, suggesting strong proficiency.
